text: Bless You, Prison () is a 2002 Romanian drama film based on the eponymous novel by Nicole Valéry Grossu. == Cast == * Maria Ploae - Nicoleta * - Prison Director * Ecaterina Nazare - Prisoner * Maria Rotaru - Prisoner == References == == External links == * Category:2002 drama films Category:Romanian films Category:Romanian drama films
title: Bless You, Prison
